Title: Running with the Bull
Writer: Ray McKinnon (created by), Ray McKinnon, Chad Feehan (executive story editor), Coleman Herbert (executive story editor), Scott Teems (story editor)
Actors: Aden Young, Abigail Spencer, J. Smith-Cameron, Adelaide Clemens
Plot: Daniel's family fears he won't recover from his injuries and his attackers will escape justice. Judy Dean shows Bobby some unexpected affection. Ted, Jr. hides a shameful secret from his wife. Sheriff Daggett investigates Daniel's beating.
